s: September 16, 2021 - The company currently sells products through Amazon.com, Kmart, and other third-party retailers. The CuteKing Weighted Blanket is the brand’s flagship product. It is filled with premium glass beads, which offer better conforming and cooler temperatures than plastic beads.
